changes: Added comprehensive database backup and migration strategy section
Included detailed scripts for PostgreSQL backup automation
Documented backup strategies for Medusa and Supabase databases

patterns_discovered: Automated backup scripts with error handling and logging
Cloud storage integration (Cloudflare R2, AWS S3)
gotchas_discovered: Need to replace placeholder values like account IDs and container names
Dependency on environment variables and secrets management
Potential performance impact of frequent backups
Complexity of managing backups across multiple database systems
recommendations: Implement secure secret management for backup scripts
Create monitoring and alerting for backup job failures
Document and version control backup configuration
Consider implementing backup encryption for sensitive data
